p: Influenza virus NA activity was measured by Neuraminidase Inhibitors Screening Kit. Neuraminidase Inhibitors Screen Kit (NO. P0309) was purchased from Beyotime Institute of Biotechnology Co. Ltd. (Shanghai, China), which contained 10 mL buffer, 1 mL NA, 1 mL fluorescent substrate and 1.2 mL Milli-Q water.
